TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Melukux, title = Melukux, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Melukux} }

S.FORM: Melukux Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsinchu ko Melukux a niyaro', 43 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 114 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 95% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 108 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 5% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 6 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 90%, Saysiyat 1%, Truku 2%, roma 2%.

Melokox Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsincho ko Melokox a niyaro', 43 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 114 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 95% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 108 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 5% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 6 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 90%, Saysiyat 1%, Troko 2%, roma 2%.
